ovdesc.p: This table will get updated while cheque clearing and ATM or POS transaction ,if the debit account number have insufficient fund or other core override

desc.p: This field hold the debit account number of the transaction.
Validation Rules
Rule: Field length - 25.
Can hold a valid account number
This field holds the application name used for the tranaction processing.
Validation Rules
No user input. System populated field
This field holds the status of the transaction as IN.PROGRESS or PAY or RETURN.
This will get updated while receiving the transaction through interface or decision making or through service routine
Validation Rules
Rule: Field length - 25
Options: PAY or RETURN or NULL
This field holds the transaction whether it's come under Overdraft protection(ODP) or waiting for End of Day Sweep from the link account (EOD.SWEEP ).
or Non sufficient fund in the debit account(NSF) or Others or waiting for special approval of overrides(NSF2)
Validation Rules
No user input. System populated field
This field holds the date on which the transaction is presented
Validation Rules
No user input. System populated field
This field holds the transaction amount
Validation Rules
No user input. System populated field
This field holds the account officer of the debit account
Validation Rules
No user input. System populated field
This field holds the flag to waive the charge or not
Validation Rules
Rule: YES or NO
This field holds the override while transaction get processed.
Validation Rules
No user input. System populated field
This field holds the channel through which the transaction is processed
Validation Rules
No user input. System populated field
This field holds the account balance while the transaction is presented for processing
Validation Rules
No user input. System populated field
This field holds the rejection code which has to be sent back to the interface which post the transaction
Setup should be done in USRETL.NSF.PARAMETER to automatically default this field based on overrides
Validation Rules
Rule: Field Length - 35
